trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Kingston
There were no other sightings in Kingston on or around November 30th 2011
Summary: appeared from direction of lenior city, tn. looked like a helo at about 2,000 feet. crossed left to directly accross from me on other side of tn river. decenced into floating hover above 2nd hill then went down behind hill.
divs: Sighting Details while sitting on porch, at about 1900 e time, watching the sky and river, west of loudon, tn... I noticed a helo off to my left decending tword a line of hills on the other side of the tennessee river from my house. it sruck me as strange, that the color was yellow and a lack of running lights. there was no sound and as it went into a hover above the 2nd hill to the right, it tended to slip back and forth in a foating motion. beside the yellow glowing color, a small green light appeared on the front of the 30ft. long elipse. the craft must have been twisting as it floated above the trees of the 2nd hill about a qtr to a half mile from me becuse a green light appeared to go off and on at the front. a road accended from left to right at this side of the hills and as i watched ,cars could be seen, running between kingston and loudon on that road. the sky was clear and aircraft could be seen in transit between various cities in e tennessee. i was waiting on my wife to return home so i could drive to knoxville. as i watched, the craft started to decend in the verticle behind the hills. no spotlight was seen and no running lights observed. i used to in air control and have years of experince observing aircraft and the sky, i don't think this was a helo. My wife returned and i went to knoville.
